languages.text: "Рад это слышать". {n}На желчном лице не видно ни капли радости.{/n} "Я всегда тревожился, что ее характер принесет немало бед нашему дому, но все же благородная кровь Зауэрбэков пересилила личные недостатки. Верю, что Иокаста достойно проявит себя". {n}Махарий выдавливает из себя подобие улыбки.{/n}

"I am pleased to hear it." {n}Nothing in Macharius's face shows that he is glad for his cousin.{/n} "I always worried that her character would cause our house a great deal of grief, and yet, in the end, the noble Sauerback blood was stronger than any personal shortcomings. I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Рад это слышать". {n}На желчном лице не видно ни капли радости.{/n} "Я всегда тревожился, что ее характер принесет немало бед нашему дому, но все же благородная кровь Зауэрбэков пересилила личные недостатки. Верю, что Иокаста достойно проявит себя". {n}Махарий выдавливает из себя подобие улыбки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I am pleased to hear it." {n}Nothing in Macharius's face shows that he is glad for his cousin.{/n} "I always worried that her character would cause our house a great deal of grief, and yet, in the end, the noble Sauerback blood was stronger than personal shortcomings. I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

"I am pleased to hear it." {n}Nothing in Macharius's face shows that he is glad for his cousin.{/n} "I always worried that her character would cause our house a great deal of grief, and yet, in the end, the noble Sauerback blood was stronger than any personal shortcomings. I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

languages.text: «Me alegro de oírlo». {n}El rostro de Macharius no muestra alegría alguna por su prima.{/n} «Siempre me preocupaba que su temperamento causara graves problemas a nuestra casa, pero al final la noble sangre Sauerback ha demostrado ser más fuerte que cualquier carencia personal. No me cabe duda de que Jocasta cumplirá adecuadamente su deber». {n}Se obliga a sonreír ligeramente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to hear it." {n}Nothing in Macharius's face shows that he is glad for his cousin.{/n} "I always worried that her character would cause our house a great deal of grief, and yet, in the end, the noble Sauerback blood was stronger than any personal shortcomings. I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de oírlo». {n}El rostro de Macharius no muestra alegría alguna por su prima.{/n} «Siempre me preocupaba que su temperamento causara graves problemas a nuestra casa, pero al final la noble sangre Sauerback ha demostrado ser más fuerte que cualquier carencia personal. No me cabe duda de que Jocasta cumplirá adecuadamente su deber». {n}Se obliga a sonreír ligeramente.{/n}

languages.text: 「それを聞けて嬉しいよ」{n}マハリウスの表情には、いとこを喜ぶ気配はまったく見られない。{/n}「私はいつも、彼女の性格が我が家に大きな悲嘆をもたらすのではないかと心配していた。結局、高貴なザウアーバックの血筋はどんな性格の欠点よりも強かったようだ。ジョカスタが彼女自身の能力を証明してくれると信じている」{n}彼はかすかな笑みを無理やり浮かべた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to hear it." {n}Nothing in Macharius's face shows that he is glad for his cousin.{/n} "I always worried that her character would cause our house a great deal of grief, and yet, in the end, the noble Sauerback blood was stronger than any personal shortcomings. I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それを聞けて嬉しいよ」{n}マハリウスの表情には、いとこを喜ぶ気配はまったく見られない。{/n}「私はいつも、彼女の性格が我が家に大きな悲嘆をもたらすのではないかと心配していた。結局、高貴なザウアーバックの血筋はどんな性格の欠点よりも強かったようだ。ジョカスタが彼女自身の能力を証明してくれると信じている」{n}彼はかすかな笑みを無理やり浮かべた。{/n}

languages.text: “这个好消息让我非常高兴。”{n}从马卡里乌斯的表情来看，他完全没有为他的表妹感到开心。{/n}“一直以来，我总是担心她的性格可能会给我们的家族带来巨大的耻辱，然而到了最后，苏尔贝克家族高贵的血统战胜了她的个人缺陷。我相信约卡斯塔会充分证明她的价值。”{n}他勉强挤出一丝微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to hear it." {n}Nothing in Macharius's face shows that he is glad for his cousin.{/n} "I always worried that her character would cause our house a great deal of grief, and yet, in the end, the noble Sauerback blood was stronger than any personal shortcomings. I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这个好消息让我非常高兴。”{n}从马卡里乌斯的表情来看，他完全没有为他的表妹感到开心。{/n}“一直以来，我总是担心她的性格可能会给我们的家族带来巨大的耻辱，然而到了最后，苏尔贝克家族高贵的血统战胜了她的个人缺陷。我相信约卡斯塔会充分证明她的价值。”{n}他勉强挤出一丝微笑。{/n}

languages.text: "Freut mich, das zu hören." {n}Nichts in Macharius' Gesicht deutet darauf hin, dass er sich für seine Vetterin freut.{/n} "Ich hatte immer befürchtet, dass ihr Charakter unserem Haus großen Kummer bereiten würde, und dennoch war das edle Sauerback-Blut am Ende stärker als persönliche Defizite. Ich vertraue darauf, dass Jocasta sich als angemessen erweisen wird." {n}Er zwingt sich zu einem schmalen Lächeln.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to hear it." {n}Nothing in Macharius's face shows that he is glad for his cousin.{/n} "I always worried that her character would cause our house a great deal of grief, and yet, in the end, the noble Sauerback blood was stronger than any personal shortcomings. I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Freut mich, das zu hören." {n}Nichts in Macharius' Gesicht deutet darauf hin, dass er sich für seine Vetterin freut.{/n} "Ich hatte immer befürchtet, dass ihr Charakter unserem Haus großen Kummer bereiten würde, und dennoch war das edle Sauerback-Blut am Ende stärker als persönliche Defizite. Ich vertraue darauf, dass Jocasta sich als angemessen erweisen wird." {n}Er zwingt sich zu einem schmalen Lächeln.{/n}

languages.text: « Je suis ravi de l'apprendre. {n}Rien dans l'expression de Macharius n'indique qu'il se réjouit pour sa cousine.{/n} J'ai toujours eu peur que son tempérament ne nuise gravement à la maison Sauerback, mais en fin de compte, la noblesse de notre sang a pris le pas sur ses défauts. J'ai bon espoir que Jocasta se montre à la hauteur de la tâche. » {n}Il esquisse l'ombre d'un sourire forcé.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to hear it." {n}Nothing in Macharius's face shows that he is glad for his cousin.{/n} "I always worried that her character would cause our house a great deal of grief, and yet, in the end, the noble Sauerback blood was stronger than any personal shortcomings. I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ravi de l'apprendre. {n}Rien dans l'expression de Macharius n'indique qu'il se réjouit pour sa cousine.{/n} J'ai toujours eu peur que son tempérament ne nuise gravement à la maison Sauerback, mais en fin de compte, la noblesse de notre sang a pris le pas sur ses défauts. J'ai bon espoir que Jocasta se montre à la hauteur de la tâche. » {n}Il esquisse l'ombre d'un sourire forcé.{/n}

languages.text: "Bunu duyduğuma memnun oldum." {n}Macharius'un ifadesinde kuzeni için memnun olduğuna dair en ufak bir emare yok.{/n} "Kişiliğinin hanemizde büyük bir kedere sebep olacağın dair hep endişelenmişimdir. Yine de sonunda Sauerback genleri, tüm şahsi kusurlarından ağır bastı. Jocasta'nın işini layıkıyla yapacağına inancım tam." {n}Zoraki bir şekilde hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am pleased to hear it." {n}Nothing in Macharius's face shows that he is glad for his cousin.{/n} "I always worried that her character would cause our house a great deal of grief, and yet, in the end, the noble Sauerback blood was stronger than any personal shortcomings. I have faith that Jocasta will prove herself adequately." {n}He forces a faint smile.{/n}
